data: {"generalSituation":"A broad band of clouds will bring a few rain patches to the coast of Guangdong and the northern part of the South China Sea today. With the band of clouds thinning out, the weather will improve over the coastal areas during the weekend and it will be warm during the day. A replenishment of the northeast monsoon will reach the coast of southern China on Sunday, and it will bring slightly cooler weather to the region in the following couple of days. Under the influence of another dry replenishment of the monsoon, it is expected to be cool in the morning and at night over the coast of Guangdong during Christmas holidays.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251219","week":"Friday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 4, occasionally force 5 at first.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. A few rain patches in the morning.
